hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #3# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of time.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: I love to gossip! Wanna be friends?

SFM (Saria).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Forest Temple#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Zora Scale# and #a Blue Rupee#.
